summary.span: 包含为托管代码提供对 Windows 7 任务栏增强功能的访问的类型。

span.span: Contains types that provide managed code access to the enhanced functionality of the Windows 7 taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供了增强的功能，使您能够使用任务栏按钮来传达给用户的状态，并且最小化或隐藏窗口时公开常见任务。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 中的类型所公开的功能命名空间不是之前的 Windows 版本中可用[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the types in the namespace is not available in versions of Windows prior to [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，某些功能可能不可用，具体取决于用户的设置。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings.
